meanings.definition: The thin, hard outer covering of an egg.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally stepped on the eggshells and they cracked.
meanings.sent2: She carefully peeled the eggshells after boiling the eggs.
meanings.sent3: The eggshells on the floor made a crunchy sound when I walked on them.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate fingers handled the eggshells as if they were fragile glass.
meanings.sent5: The sun shining through the eggshells created a beautiful pattern on the table.

meanings.definition: Fragments of the outer covering of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The eggshells were scattered around the nest, evidence of a hungry predator.
meanings.sent2: He carefully swept the eggshells off the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the eggshells to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: The eggshells crunched under my feet as I walked through the garden.
meanings.sent5: The children used the eggshells in their art project, creating a unique texture.
